roleset.name: visit, meet with, see, travel to see

example.name: visit-v: non-personal party
example.text: Argentine negotiator Carlos Carballo will visit with banks this week .

example.name: visit-v: usually visit a place?
example.text: Three Soviet government officials -- the ministers of railroads , of foreign economic relations and of heavy - machine building -- will visit Tehran next month for talks , Iran 's official news agency reported .

propbank.arg: Three Soviet government officials -- the ministers of railroads , of foreign economic relations and of heavy - machine building --

example.name: visit-v: all parties in arg0
example.text: The economic and foreign ministers of 12 Asian and Pacific nations will visit in Australia next week to discuss the price of beans .

propbank.arg: The economic and foreign ministers of 12 Asian and Pacific nations
to discuss the price of beans

example.name: visit-n: Tricky, but meeting with people rather than seeing a place.
example.text: Many are far enough from residential areas to pass public muster , yet close enough to permit family visits .

example.name: visit-n: Common
example.text: During his visit with Barack Obama ,

example.name: visit-n: Both args
example.text: On the fourth day of his visit to China ,

example.name: visit-n: With arg ms
example.text: a three - day official visit to Helsinki

example.name: visit-n
example.text: Now he is mounting the steps of a stucco building in a nearby village , on a visit to the Communist administrator , the " naczelnik "

propbank.arg: to the Communist administrator , the " naczelnik "

roleset.note: VISIT-V NOTES: Member of Vncls meet-36.3-1. Frames file for 'visit' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from visit.01-v)
VISIT-N NOTES: Added due to nombank additions. VN class meet-36.3-1. Comparison with visit.01. No VN class. Created by Katie. (from visit.01-n)
VISIT-N NOTES: Added due to expansion of nombank. No VN class. FN classes visiting and arriving. Comparison to verb-travel.01 (from visit.02-n)
VISITING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from visiting.01-n)

roleset.name: chat

example.name: visit-v: arg0
example.text: No , we 're going to be in Wilmington first and then planning to stop in center city on the way back . We can hang out for a while until you guys are free and then just visit for a little bit ?

roleset.note: VISIT-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from visit.02-v)
